channel.title: CVE Feed for Philip Hazel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Philip Hazel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43700|2024-10-15T13:43:55.358Z -- philip%20hazel -- xfpt
item.description: xfpt versions prior to 1.01 fails to handle appropriately some parameters inside the input data, resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. When a user of the affected product is tricked to process a specially crafted file, arbitrary code may be executed on the user's environment.

item.title: CVE-2024-41881|2024-07-29T17:05:48.360Z -- philip%20hazel -- sdop
item.description: SDoP versions prior to 1.11 fails to handle appropriately some parameters inside the input data, resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. When a user of the affected product is tricked to process a specially crafted XML file, arbitrary code may be executed on the user's environment.
